name: GKNSPredicateRule
desc: A rule for use in a rule system that uses a Foundation NSPredicate object to evaluate itself.

items.name: init(predicate: NSPredicate)
items.desc: Initializes a rule with the specified predicate.

items.name: var predicate: NSPredicate
items.desc: A predicate to be tested when evaluating the rule.

items.name: func evaluatePredicate(in: GKRuleSystem) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the ruleâ€™s predicate has been satisfied in the context of the specified rule system.
